name: @aleen42/postcss-rtlcss

5.1.3-beta.0.name: @aleen42/postcss-rtlcss
5.1.3-beta.0.description: PostCSS plugin to build Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) with Left-To-Right (LTR) and Right-To-Left (RTL) rules

scripts.build: pnpm clean && rollup --config rollup.config.js --bundleConfigAsCjs && pnpm copy && pnpm modify-dts
